sections.heading: operation of public schools; notice to State Board of Education
sections.text: No public school district shall convert to a year-round operation without notifying the State Board of Education of compliance with sections 79-503 to 79-505.SourceLaws 1973, LB 65, § 3;Laws 1993, LB 348, § 9;R.S.1943, (1994), § 79-201.

79-505.Year-round operation of public schools; notice to State Board of Education.

No public school district shall convert to a year-round operation without notifying the State Board of Education of compliance with sections 79-503 to 79-505.

SourceLaws 1973, LB 65, § 3;Laws 1993, LB 348, § 9;R.S.1943, (1994), § 79-201.03;Laws 1996, LB 900, § 258.
